body_html:
Done moving Travis contbuilds to ci.pytorch.org.

Windows CI is currently running slow (~40 mins for a clean build, and incremental build with clcache is unstable), probably need to speed up more before enabling it in PRs.

Also working on gcc 4.8 and 7.x CPU contbuilds.

body:
Done moving Travis contbuilds to ci.pytorch.org.

Windows CI is currently running slow (~40 mins for a clean build, and incremental build with clcache is unstable), probably need to speed up more before enabling it in PRs.

Also working on gcc 4.8 and 7.x CPU contbuilds.
